'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

== Background==
This wealthy estate on the western side of Serpent's Crown is the home of [[Lady Epero]], formerly of one of the most infamous ships to ever grace the waters of the Deadfire, ''The Firebrand''.

==Points of interest==
* A straightforward area. Careful, as you'll be attacked by the lady and her war dogs upon entering.

==Characters==
* [[Lady Epero]], infamous owner of the estate.

==Loot==
* [[Soul Void]]: Carried by Lady Epero.
